sentence.Network_en: It was a time for mourning and lamentation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个沉痛悼念的时刻。

sentence.Network_en: This ingredient does not invite or generally produce lugubrious lamentation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一要素并不引起,或者说通常不产生故作悲伤的叹息.

sentence.Network_en: Much lamentation followed the death of the old king.
sentence.Network_cn: 老国王晏驾,人们悲恸不已.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 5. erect v. 建立，使竖立6. lamentation n. 伤心，恸哭8. fetter n. 桎梏，（常用复）脚镣.
右侧面板显示的是一个哀歌（Lamentation）。也许范德是为了并列的表明基督的两个重要时刻。
lamentable 可悲的lamentation 哀伤lamp 灯
Full is the lamentation at heart., 心里满是悔恨.

list.abs: Dickinson laments : " too much sun Alexa eyes , the truth , like the sun , see the eye is also blind . "狄金森感叹：“阳光太灼眼，真理也如阳光，看到了，眼也瞎了。”
people lament the passing of the good old days .人们惋惜过去的好时光的流逝。
He composed a lament to the dead soldier ., 他为那位阵亡的战士谱写了一首挽歌.
lament for/over sb/sthlament over哀悼;悔改e.g. She lamented for us abut her wretched lot.

entry.def: A lamentation is an expression of great sorrow.

example.ex: It was a time for mourning and lamentation.
example.tran: 这是一个沉痛悼念的时刻。

means.word_mean: 1. a cry of sorrow and grief;

sentences.sentence: "their pitiful laments could be heard throughout the ward"

means.word_mean: 2. the passionate and demonstrative activity of expressing grief

auth_sentence.content: Lamentation and hope were mingled among the Trailhead inhabitants.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lamentation and hope were mingled among the Trailhead inhabitants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lamentation and hope were mingled among the Trailhead inhabitants.

auth_sentence.content: Her life was a history of abdication and lamentation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her life was a history of abdication and lamentation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her life was a history of abdication and lamentation.

auth_sentence.content: Another subject of general lamentation is the evil produced by party spirit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Another subject of general lamentation is the evil produced by party spirit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Another subject of general lamentation is the evil produced by party spirit.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿
